name: Modern Gunship Shooting Battle
description:
The basic mission in this game is to destroy different enemy assets such as tanks, towers, warships, jets and helicopters by using our gunship helicopter. To successfully complete all missions, take cover in the skies, stay away from the enemy trackers and stealthily take out the mighty tank army to pieces. You have to stay alive, so use your artilleries to overcome and survive the war base in this battle.

Game Features:
- Realistic Helicopter shooting
- Shooting simulator
- Outstanding music & sounds
- Amazing HD, 3D Graphics
- High Tech drones
- 40+ challenging levels
